name: obsidian-canvas-card-bg-remover
description: This is a plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md). You can make the background of cards transparent in the Canvas.

scripts.build: npm run version && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
